name: filelss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈(Fil ` c1), c2 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c1, c0 ∈(fBas ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(c2, c1))

comment: An element of a filter is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
